# Description

The L1 Ball prior [@l1_ball] is a spike-and-slab type prior.

# Definition

For a linear model:

$$
\begin{align}
y_i &\sim \text{normal} (\mu_i,\sigma^2) \\
\mu_i &= \alpha + \beta \cdot x_i
\end{align}
$$

The prior is:

$$
\begin{align}
\beta &= \text{argmin}_{\|x\|_1 \leq r} \|\beta_{\text{unprojected}} - x\|^2_2 \\
\beta_{unprojected} \sim \text{normal}(0, 1) \\
\sigma &\sim p(\sigma)
\r &\sim p(r)
\end{align}
$$

# Things to specify

Prior on the radius, prior on $\sigma$
